page.title: 06ROADS,LICKEY/CATSHILL
page.content: {M42 } The building of the M42 has created problems:the destruction of beautiful countryside and traffic chaos. The building of the A38 interchange has delayed much of the traffic on this main road. {M5 The widening of the{M5}has caused delays.Many diversions have been put up to bypass the roadworks.At stages the motorway has been closed completely. {Marlbrook Landfill Site This has caused a lot of distress.The lorries trundling up and down Alvechurch Highway are damaging the roads with their weight.Also the vibrations damage houses as the lorries go past and cause noise nuisance.
